alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Henry; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 2:24PM CDT until July 18 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Weakley County in west Tennessee... Benton County in west Tennessee... Carroll County in west Tennessee... Henry County in west Tennessee... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 223 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Paris Landing State Park to near Dresden, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Martin, Paris, McKenzie, Huntingdon, Camden, Paris Landing State Park, Dresden, New Johnsonville, Bruceton, Gleason, Sharon, Atwood, Cottage Grove, Vale, Springville, Routon, Palmersville, Trezevant, Hollow Rock and Puryear. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
